title: Setting display property to 'none' does not hide label in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label associated with the item is not hidden as expected.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label is still visible.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label should be hidden.
SR:
1. Open the new PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Verify if the associated label is hidden in the PDF preview.
